response.original_title: August Burns Red Twenty Year Tour Live
response.overview: Experience the raw energy and musical evolution of August Burns Red as they celebrate two decades of groundbreaking metalcore with their 20-Year Anniversary Tour. Captured live, this video features the Grammy-nominated band from Lancaster, Pennsylvania, delivering a powerhouse performance that spans their entire nine-album discography. From the intense breakdowns to the melodic interludes, witness the versatility and passion that have defined August Burns Red's legacy in the music scene. Join the celebration of their monumental journey through this unforgettable concert experience.
response.title: August Burns Red Twenty Year Tour Live
